tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE solo_travel_trends (
  travel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  traveler_name VARCHAR(50),
  destination VARCHAR(100),
  travel_date DATE,
  travel_purpose TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE solo_travelers (
   traveler_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   traveler_name VARCHAR(50),
   gender VARCHAR(10),
   age INT,
   country_of_origin VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE travel_logs (
   log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   traveler_id INT,  
   destination VARCHAR(100),  
   duration_days INT,  
   travel_purpose VARCHAR(100),
   FOREIGN KEY (traveler_id) REFERENCES solo_travelers(traveler_id)
);

CREATE TABLE travel_activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR(50),
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  activity_date DATE,
  traveler_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (traveler_id) REFERENCES solo_travelers(traveler_id)
);

CREATE TABLE travel_ratings (
  rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_id INT,
  rating FLOAT,
  review TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES travel_activities(activity_id)
);

CREATE TABLE solo_travelers (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    country_of_origin VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    date_joined DATE
);

CREATE TABLE solo_destinations (
    destination_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    country VARCHAR(50),
    region VARCHAR(50),
    travel_purpose TEXT,
    rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE solo_trips (
    trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    destination_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    duration_days INT,
    cost FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES solo_travelers(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (destination_id) REFERENCES solo_destinations(destination_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trip_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trip_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    review_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (trip_id) REFERENCES solo_trips(trip_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES solo_travelers(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SoloTravelers (
  traveler_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  traveler_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  country_of_origin VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE TravelDestinations (
  destination_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  destination_name VARCHAR(255),
  region VARCHAR(100),
  popular_activities TEXT,
  average_rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE TravelHistory (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  traveler_id INT,
  destination_id INT,
  travel_date DATE,
  total_duration INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (traveler_id) REFERENCES SoloTravelers(traveler_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (destination_id) REFERENCES TravelDestinations(destination_id)
)

CREATE TABLE TravelExpenses (
  expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  history_id INT,
  accommodation_cost FLOAT,
  transportation_cost FLOAT,
  food_cost FLOAT,
  total_cost FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (history_id) REFERENCES TravelHistory(history_id)
)

CREATE TABLE TravelReviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  history_id INT,
  rating INT,
  review_text TEXT,
  review_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (history_id) REFERENCES TravelHistory(history_id)
)
